item.title: SE
item.description: score:208 Chances: Sea Ltd. is a diversified internet and mobile platform company with strong growth potential in its Digital Entertainment, E-Commerce, and Digital Financial Services segments. The company’s E-Commerce segment, Shopee, has the potential for significant growth as it connects buyers and sellers in a third-party marketplace.
